name: The adventures of Sisharpic
description:
Plot:

Welcome to the magical forest where Gamepads lived in peace and quiet until the forces of evil killed them all.
We left only two joysticks for experiments, but they managed to escape, but after a while they returned and took the girl and now our brave joystick went to save her.

The main character


The main character is called Sisharpic, this is a joystick which wants to save his beloved girl from an unknown enemy.
And for this, in order for him to succeed, you need to help him.
He has his own peculiarity, unfortunately, he cannot fight, he does not have a sword, but there are platforms on which he is charged and with the help of this he can use his powers.

The adventures of Sisharpic


The adventures of Sisharpic is a 2D platformer in which you need to find your girlfriend who has been stolen.
Enemies and various threats such as thorns and much more will be waiting for you in the game.
In order to save your girlfriend you need to go through all these obstacles and prove that you are a very strong and brave joystick.
There are also a couple of bosses waiting for you.

You must be careful because the enemy can be very close

Peculiarities

  • Good graphics
  • Interesting journey
  • Explore every nook and cranny of a thoughtful world
